product_name: Oboz Wind River II BDry Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Explore wild locations, or your favorite local hike, in the Oboz Wind River II BDry hiking boots. Waterproof nubuck leather uppers feature abrasion-resistant nylon mesh panels for just the right combination of breathability and protection. BDry(TM) waterproof, breathable membranes keep soggy elements out while letting water vapor escape, keeping your feet cool and comfortable. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and further enhance breathability. BFit Deluxe footbeds feature a well-defined arch for support. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning, while polyurethane pods in heels soak up impact forces for increased comfort. Nylon shanks offer torsional stability and protection underfoot, increasing surefootedness on varied terrain. Rubber randing on toes and heels protects uppers from abrasion. High-friction, nonmarking carbon rubber outsoles grip with ease in all directions on both wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: Explore wild locations, or your favorite local hike, in the Oboz Wind River II BDry hiking boots.
